Query.a:string: join user_groups u on g.cod_group = u.cod_group
(select cod_group,cod_user from tree where cod_user = @cod_user union select null, null),
(select xmlobject_uid, max(xmlobject_version) maxversion from XMLObjects group by xmlobject_uid)
select cod_xmlobject, xmlobject_name,xmlobject_description, xmlobject_uid, xmlobject_version, object_type, serializer_type, object_data, provider_type,maxversion,
ORDER BY CASE WHEN p.cod_group = @cod_group and p.cod_user = @cod_user THEN 0 WHEN p.cod_user = @cod_user THEN 1 WHEN p.cod_group = @cod_group THEN 2 ELSE 3 END) orank from xmlobjects o
join maxversion mv on o.xmlobject_uid = mv.xmlobject_uid
left outer join xml_permissions p on o.cod_xmlobject = p.cod_xmlobject
join usrgrp on isnull(p.cod_group,0) = isnull(usrgrp.cod_group,0) and isnull(usrgrp.cod_user,@cod_user) = isnull(p.cod_user,@cod_user)
join xml_connections x on x.cod_connection = c.cod_connection

join usrgrp on isnull(x.cod_group,0) = isnull(usrgrp.cod_group,0) and isnull(usrgrp.cod_user,@cod_user) = isnull(x.cod_user,@cod_user)) dbc on isnull(dbc.cod_xmlobject,o.cod_xmlobject) = o.cod_xmlobject) ro

Procedure.FriendlyName: Assign Default Connection to New Objects
